ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype
Interface OrientableShape

All Superinterfaces:
java.awt.Shape
All Known Implementing Classes:
BackboneShape, CompositeShape, NonFragmentingStretchableShape, PinnableShape, StretchableShape, StrokedBackboneShape
public interface OrientableShape
extends java.awt.Shape

Describes a shape which can be broken up into sub regions of a particular orientation.

Author:
aaron

Gets the sub region of this shape with the given orientation.

Returns:
